title: Medium pouch

properties.name: description
properties.value: Medium pouches are bags that can hold 6 rune, pure or daeyalt essence for use in the Runecraft skill. This item requires level 25 Runecraft to use. This item is dropped by Abyssal monsters. It is also a reward from the Temple of the Eye quest if one hasn't been obtained prior.

SMW Subobject for NewHigh Alchemy value: 180Examine: A medium-sized pouch used for storing essence.Is members only: trueIs variant of: Medium pouchUses infobox: ItemImage: File:Medium pouch.pngWeight: 1.000Value: 300Version anchor: NewRelease date: 13 June 2005Item ID: 5510

Medium pouches are bags that can hold 6 rune, pure or daeyalt essence for use in the Runecraft skill. This item requires level 25 Runecraft to use. This item is dropped by Abyssal monsters. It is also a reward from the Temple of the Eye quest if one hasn't been obtained prior.

This is the fourth best essence pouch that can be obtained.

After its 44th use, the pouch will degrade and hold only 3 essence. Further uses degrade the capacity even more, and it will eventually disintegrate completely, and must be reacquired thereafter. To repair the pouch so it can hold the maximum of six essence again, you must speak to the Dark mage located in the centre of the Abyss.

Essence contained in the pouch when it's dropped will be lost. A message will pop up and tell the player: "The contents of the pouch fell out as you dropped it!".

Item sources[edit | edit source]

For an exhaustive list of all known sources for this item, see here (include RDT).
SourceLevelQuantityRarity
Abyssal guardian59 11/42
Abyssal leech41 11/42
Abyssal walker81 11/42

The pouch is only dropped if the player does not already have one in their inventory or bank, and lower-tiered pouches are owned. The Runecraft level (25) is not necessary to have in order for the pouch to be dropped.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
31 March 2022
(update) 		Hotfix

The medium pouch is no longer re-obtainable after creating the colossal pouch.

8 November 2018
(update)

The degraded pouch was graphically updated to distinguish it from the regular version.

18 May 2017
(update)

Shift-clicking now empties the pouch instead of dropping it.

23 February 2017
(update | poll)

Essence pouches will no longer degrade if a Runecrafting skillcape or Max cape is worn while filling the pouch. Existing pouches which are degraded will not be repaired in any way with this change, but they will also not degrade any further whilst a Runecrafting skillcape or Max cape is worn.
